body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Jose Martinez and I'm from ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Dorothy Martin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Dorothy. Can you confirm your address and date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my address is four five six Elm Street, and my date of birth is September ninth nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy. Can you also provide your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero one, and my email address is d.martin@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Dorothy. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. I just needed help with the billing issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad I could assist you with that. Thank you for your time, Dorothy. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: You're welcome, and thank you. Goodbye.
